content: the shimmer crochet scarf is a fun quick and easy project that could easily be worked up in just a weekend hook size - 8 0 mm crochet hook suggested yarn - 2 balls of red heart hygge charm in color meteor each ball is 7oz / 432 yds medium-4 weight yarn 97% acrylic 3% other fibers sizing & finished measurements - one size approximately 15 inches wide by 76 inches long gauge - 12 st by 10 row = 4 inches of pattern stitch single_crochet & double_crochet combo stitch this pattern can be viewed for free on my blog here https //justbcrafty com/2019/09/shimmer-crochet-wrap html
